title: Classic Legends to open 200 Jawa-Yezdi showrooms every year
description: Classic Legends, a subsidiary of Mahindra and Mahindra Ltd, plans to open 200 new retail showrooms annually. This was announced by the company's CEO, Ashish Singh Joshi, who mentioned that the company is also preparing to launch the popular BSA range of motorcycles on August 15. This statement was made during the inauguration of 'Swastik Motors,' a new 6,000 sq ft showroom at Mount Poonamallee, the largest in India.
